critique: The initial scores seem reasonable given the document's content and tone. The document aims to evoke a sense of decisiveness and a return to national interests, potentially generating joy among supporters and fear or disgust among those who disagree with the withdrawal from the WHO. The surprise score is low because the action was foreshadowed. The sadness score is moderate, reflecting potential concerns about global health cooperation. However, I will slightly adjust the scores to better reflect the nuances of the intended emotional impact. I will increase the joy score to emphasize the positive reaction from supporters and slightly increase the fear and disgust scores to acknowledge the stronger negative reactions from opponents. I will also slightly decrease the sadness score as the document focuses more on decisive action than on expressing sorrow.
